body_html:
@theflofly this is true about gradients, I had to add some simple gradient operations myself, before they were introduced in 1.4 release.
regarding Adam the main thing I guess is adding slots implementation to base Optimizer from what I've seen in Python code, because in C++ this seems to be missing too.

body:
@theflofly this is true about gradients, I had to add some simple gradient operations myself, before they were introduced in 1.4 release.
regarding Adam the main thing I guess is adding slots implementation to base Optimizer from what I've seen in Python code, because in C++ this seems to be missing too.
